Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'So this all started because the mechanoids are competing?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Due to the urgent situation and the unexpected riots, you can only do the mission briefing with Karenina on the transport craft.'}
{3: "Karenina opens an image file on the terminal upon hearing WGAA's report on Constellia."}
{3: 'It is a metal wall that seems to be built to protect some form of mechanical device.'}
{3: 'But that was how it used to look.'}
{3: 'She opens more photos taken by the other teams. The metal wall has transformed into several mechanoid statues standing under the dawning sun.'}
{3: 'Sitting next to you, Karenina keeps turning the terminal around, seemingly trying to find an angle at which she can understand the art of mechanoids.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'The Palette Clash, is it...? What the hell are these statues...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Based on what we've been told, we shouldn't treat these as some kind of stunt, should we?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'The awakened machines are for real, after all.', 4: '1'}
{2: "We don't have to get involved if you don't want to.", 3: '16'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Does our captain look like someone who knows art? Maybe she\'s hoping to establish the school of "Destructive Ephemeralism" to impress the mechanoids.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Whoa. They turned a wall into this overnight? Are they stupid or determined?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Why... why are you here?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Am I interrupting something?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'm on a mission with Commandant! Why are you on our comms right now?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I volunteered?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I don't remember seeing a Teddy in our supplies.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Relax. WGAA asked me to look after the supplies you requested.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'They would really like them to last beyond a singular use.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Teddy sends over a bunch of instructions to Karenina to prove her point.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'How dumb do you think I am? Of course I know about all of this!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina refuses to accept the files, but that does not stop Teddy from sending them over repeatedly.'}
{3: 'And the two of them begin to compete on their terminals across the monitors.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Just take a look, won't you? I have to report back to WGAA, and Commandant here can use a primer.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'm not falling for this again! I bet you're going to sneak in some weird stuff with the instructions!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Teddy looks slightly disappointed. As Karenina places her finger over the disconnect button threateningly, Teddy has to give up turning on the assistance software.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "By the way, WGAA isn't holding back this time. It used to take us half a day just to request a few boxes of these. Now, we're shipping them to Constellia in crates.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I don't care what they think. Getting our hands on them has saved me a lot of effort.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I'm glad you have a plan, even though that doesn't sound like you. Anyway, nobody said anything, so I'm not going to stop you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Stop me? You made it sound like... wait...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I thought you were here to help?! What did you say back there?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Nothing. I was just the first person to oppose your plan after General Wells was done talking.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'TEDDY!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Teddy disappears from the terminal before Karenina can finish, her face replaced with the word "Disconnected."'}
{2: 'Transport Craft Pilot', 3: 'Two minutes out.'}
{3: "You hear the pilot's notice on your comms."}
{3: 'You look out the window, and the windmill you have not seen for a while seems to be waving at you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{2: 'Dulcinea', 3: 'Are these the "local specialty" the humans from Kowloong offer in social situations?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Karenina and you start moving the boxes out of the cabin once the transport craft has landed, right until the white-haired girl who has been waiting for you appears by the door.'}
{2: 'These are gifts we prepared to solve your problem.'}
